hibernate-mapping.query: update TLMORM00025 recon set recon.Cursel = 0, recon.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId, recon.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where recon.Cursel = 1 and recon.BranchCode=:branch and recon.Type=:type and Convert(Char(10),recon.Date_Time,111) = :date and recon.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBranch and recon.Active = true

delete from TLMORM00025 as recon where recon.Type = :type and recon.BranchCode = :branchcode and Convert(Char(10),recon.Date_Time,111) = :datetime and recon.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBranch and recon.Active = true

select new reconsiledto( b.BranchCode, r.Date_Time, r.Type, r.DagRno, r.AgRno, r.DupNo, r.Cursel, r.SourceBranchCode, b.BranchDescription, b.BranchAlias ) from TLMORM00025 as r right join r.Branch as b where b.OtherBank = 0 and b.BranchCode != :sourcebranchcode and b.Active = true order by b.BranchCode,r.Date_Time desc

select new reconsiledto( r.BranchCode, r.Date_Time, r.Type, r.DagRno, r.AgRno, r.DupNo, r.Cursel ) from TLMORM00025 as r where r.Type = :type and YEAR(r.Date_Time) = YEAR(:datetime) and MONTH(r.Date_Time) = MONTH(:datetime) and DAY(r.Date_Time) = DAY(:datetime) and r.Cursel = 1 and r.BranchCode in (:branchcodelist) and r.Active = true order by r.BranchCode
select max(reconsile.Id) from TLMORM00025 as reconsile
